languages.text: The Bladedancer faces a side of their choice and immediately ends their turn. Until the beginning of the Bladedancer's next turn, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving, are immune to all types of forced movement, gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against attacks from that side, and can now parry attacks made against adjacent allies. While under the effect of Veil of Blades, the Bladedancer can even parry ranged attacks (except ranged area attacks) made from that side. The chance to parry a ranged attack is calculated as if it were a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, where the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of the attack. If an attack is parried in this way, it can be redirected toward one of the enemies on the selected side. The chance of redirection is equal to half of the Bladedancer's parry chance against this attack. ! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped.

traits.locale_text:
Reaper turns towards the selected side and immediately ends their turn. Until the beginning of the Reaper's next turn, Reaper is immune to forced movement, can dodge area effect attacks without moving, and gains +20% parry chance to parry attacks from that side and can now parry attacks against adjacent allies. While under Blade Shroud, the Reaper can parry even non-area ranged attacks — the chance to parry ranged attacks is calculated as if they were melee attacks with the Weapon Skill of the attacker equal to the hit chance of the attack. If an attack is parried this way, it has a chance to be redirected towards one of the enemies at the selected side — the chance of this happening is equal to half of the Reaper's Parry against this attack.
This ability can only be used with a sword.

The Bladedancer turns to a side of their choice and immediately ends their turn. Until the beginning of the Bladedancer's next turn, they can dodge area attacks without movement, are immune to all types of forced movement, gain +20% parry against attacks from that side, and can now parry attacks made against adjacent allies. While under the effect of Veil of Blades, the Bladedancer can parry even ranged attacks (except area attacks) made from that side. The chance to parry a ranged attack is calculated as if it was a melee attack with the Weapon Skill of the attacker equal to the hit chance of the attack. If an attack is parried this way, it can be redirected towards one of the enemies at the selected side with a chance equal to half of the Bladedancer's parry chance against this attack. ! This ability can only be used with a sword in hand.

languages.text: El hoja danzante se queda mirando a una dirección a su elección y termina su turno de inmediato. Hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno, puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} sin moverse, es inmune a todos los tipos de movimiento forzado, gana +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}desvío{/g} contra los ataques de esa dirección y puede desviar ataques que se realicen contra sus aliados adyacentes. Mientras está bajo el efecto de Velo de acero, el hoja danzante puede también desviar ataques a distancia (excepto ataques de área a distancia) que se realicen desde esa dirección. La probabilidad de desviar un ataque a distancia se calcula como si fuera un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en el que la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del atacante es igual a la {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} del ataque. Si se desvía un ataque de esta forma, se puede redirigir contra uno de los enemigos en la dirección elegida. La probabilidad de redirección es igual a la mitad de la probabilidad de desvío del hoja danzante contra el ataque. ! Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo se puede usar con una espada equipada.

languages.text: ブレードダンサーは好きな方向を向いて即座にターンを終了する。ブレードダンサーの次のターンが始まるまで、移動せず{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}範囲攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}回避{/g}でき、あらゆるタイプの強制移動に耐性を持ち、その方向哮からの攻撃に{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}+20%を獲得し、隣接する味方に対する攻撃を受け流しできるようになる。ブレードのヴェールの効果を受けている間、ブレードダンサーはその方向からの遠距離攻撃（遠距離範囲攻撃を除く）も受け流せる。遠距離攻撃を受け流す確率は、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}と同じように、攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}を攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}として計算される。攻撃がこの方法で受け流された場合、選択した方向にいる敵のいずれかに攻撃を誘引することができる。誘引が起きる確率は、この攻撃に対するブレードダンサーの受け流し率の半分に等しい。 ！この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は剣装備時のみ使用できる。

languages.text: 刀锋舞者选择一个方向，立刻结束回合。在刀锋舞者的下个回合开始前，刀锋舞者可以在不移动的情况下{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，对所有强制位移效果免疫，对抗来自目标方向的攻击时，额外获得20%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，而且可以招架来自周围盟友的攻击。当刀锋舞者受到森罗刃网效果影响时，甚至可以招架来自目标方向的远程攻击（远程范围攻击除外）。招架远程攻击的几率与招架{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的计算方式相同，攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}等同于攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}。当刀锋舞者以这种方式招架攻击时，会有一定几率将来袭的攻击转向目标方向其中一名敌人身上，攻击转向的几率等同于刀锋舞者对抗此次攻击招架几率的一半。 ！此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能在装备长剑的情况下使用。

languages.text: Le danselame fait face à la direction de son choix et met immédiatement fin à son tour. Jusqu'au début de son tour suivant, le danselame peut {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} sans avoir à se déplacer, est insensible aux déplacements forcés, bénéficie de +20 % à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} contre les attaques venant de cette direction et peut parer les attaques visant les alliés adjacents. Sous l'effet de Voile de lames, le danselame peut parer les attaques à distance (hors attaques de zone à distance) venant de cette direction. Les chances de parer une attaque à distance sont calculées comme s'il s'agissait d'une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, où la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de l'attaquant est égale aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} de l'attaque. Une attaque parée de cette manière peut être redirigée vers l'un des ennemis du côté sélectionné. Les chances de redirection sont égales à la moitié des chances de parade du danselame contre cette attaque. ! Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec une épée.

languages.text: Der Klingentänzer wählt eine Seite seiner Wahl und beendet sofort seinen Zug. Bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Klingentänzers kann er {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}, ohne sich zu bewegen, ist immun gegen alle Arten von erzwungener Bewegung, erhält +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} gegen Angriffe von dieser Seite und kann jetzt Angriffe gegen angrenzende Verbündete parieren. Unter dem Effekt von Schleier der Klingen kann der Klingentänzer sogar Fernkampfangriffe (allerdings keine Fernkampf-Flächenangriffe) von dieser Seite parieren. Die Chance, einen Fernkampfangriff zu parieren, errechnet sich, als handele es sich um einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, bei dem die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} des Angreifers der {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} des Angriffs entspricht. Wird ein Angriff auf diese Weise pariert, kann er auf einen der Gegner auf der gewählten Seite umgeleitet werden. Die Chance dafür entspricht der Hälfte der Parieren-Chance des Klingentänzers gegen diesen Angriff. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur eingesetzt werden, wenn ein Schwert ausgerüstet ist.

languages.text: Танцор смерти поворачивается в выбранную сторону и немедленно завершает ход. До начала своего следующего хода он может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g} без перемещения и парировать атаки против союзников на соседних клетках, а также получает иммунитет к любому принудительному перемещению и +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} атак с выбранной стороны. Под воздействием Покрова из клинков танцор смерти может парировать даже {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционные атаки{/g} (кроме атак по площади) с выбранной стороны.{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}{/g} Шанс парировать дистанционную атаку рассчитывается, как для атаки в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, когда {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} атакующего равен {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шансу попадания{/g} этой атаки. Парировав атаку таким образом, танцор смерти может перенаправить ее в одного из противников с той же стороны с шансом, равным половине его парирования против этой атаки. ! Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} может использоваться только с мечом.
languages.original_text: The Bladedancer faces a side of their choice and immediately ends their turn. Until the beginning of the Bladedancer's next turn, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} without moving, are immune to all types of forced movement, gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against attacks from that side, and can now parry attacks made against adjacent allies. While under the effect of Veil of Blades, the Bladedancer can even parry ranged attacks (except ranged area attacks) made from that side. The chance to parry a ranged attack is calculated as if it were a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, where the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of the attack. If an attack is parried in this way, it can be redirected toward one of the enemies on the selected side. The chance of redirection is equal to half of the Bladedancer's parry chance against this attack. ! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped.

languages.text: Kılıç Dansçısı, yüzünü seçtiği bir tarafa döner ve turunu anında sonlandırır. Kılıç Dansçısı; bir sonraki turunun başlangıcına dek {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarından{/g} hareket etmeden {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınabilir{/g}, tüm zorla hareket ettiren eylemlere karşı bağışıklık kazanır, o taraftan gelen saldırılara karşı +%20 {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} elde eder ve bitişikteki dost birimlere karşı yapılan saldırıları artık savuşturabilir. Hatta Kılıç Dansçısı, Bıçakların Örtüsü kabiliyetinin etkisi altındayken o taraftan yapılan menzilli saldırıları bile (menzilli alan saldırıları hariç) savuşturabilir. Menzilli bir saldırıyı savuşturma olasılığı, saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliğinin saldırının {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığına{/g} eşit olduğu bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısıymış{/g} gibi hesaplanır. Bir saldırı bu şekilde savuşturulursa seçilen taraftaki düşmanlardan birine yönlendirilebilir. Yönlendirme olasılığı, Kılıç Dansçısı'nın o saldırıyı savuşturma olasılığının yarısına eşittir. ! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} yalnızca kılıç kuşanılmışsa kullanılabilir.
